# Quiqup Skills

> A shared Claude Code skills marketplace by [Quiqup Ltd](https://quiqup.com)

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)

## What is this?

A curated collection of [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) skills maintained by Quiqup. Each skill teaches Claude domain-specific knowledge so it can assist with specialized tasks — data modeling, infrastructure, internal tooling, and more.

## Install

### Via plugin marketplace

```
/plugin marketplace add quiqupltd/claude-skills
```

### Manual install

Clone the repo and copy the skill you need into your Claude skills directory:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/quiqupltd/claude-skills.git
cp -r claude-skills/skills/<skill-name> ~/.claude/skills/
```

## Skills Catalog

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| [cube-modeling](skills/cube-modeling/) | Cube data modeling language expert — cubes, views, measures, dimensions, joins, pre-aggregations, and advanced patterns |

## Contributing

To add a new skill:

1. Fork this repo
2. Create a directory under `skills/` with your skill name
3. Add a `SKILL.md` file (see [template/SKILL.md](template/SKILL.md) for the required format)
4. Optionally add a `references/` directory for supplementary docs
5. Update the Skills Catalog table in this README
6. Open a pull request

### Skill structure

```
skills/
└── your-skill/
    ├── SKILL.md              # Required — skill definition with frontmatter
    └── references/           # Optional — supplementary reference docs
        ├── topic-a.md
        └── topic-b.md
```
